Text.Page:
Hey! You look like you can handle yourself. Can you give me a hand?

I'm supposed to be mining shards, but those {@LinkCreature:49#2}s and {@LinkCreature:49#101}s will tear me to bits.

Tell you whatâ€”if you clear those blasted kelba refiners away, I'll pay you in {@RawItem:206811}s.

See, this is why you're a soldier and I'm a miner. You lived. I wouldn't have.

As promised, here's your payment. I picked out the best ones for you.
